title: VERY ANNOYING bug on Karthus since his rework graphic
body:
I'm kinda mad because I lose another ranked because of a bug on karthus who happends **EVERY TIME ** you proc his passiv. 

When you proc the passiv, there is 1-2 seconds where you can't cast your Q spell. I lost many kills and many GAMES because of that bug.
I know that karthus is not a very popular champ, but think about the player like me who does main him. 

This bug is present SINCE HIS REWORK and happends EVERY F*KING TIME you proc his passiv, it's not like a bug who happends 1games / 1000, no no it happends EVERY TIME you die in EVERY game you make.

I already made on a post on a french forum 3 month ago, but apprently no one care and I bet if it was a bug like this on a popular champ like LB / Fizz it would be solved in less than a week.

So plz, solve it.

I was a Veigar main until 5.4. Veigar (pre 5.4) was a niche pick and he was definitely great in those niches. However, when those niches were not available to him he suffered. That doesn't mean he always did poorly, it just means that he didn't do as well as he could've done in another situation.

Please don't take what someone says and misconstrue it just because you disagree with their opinion. I'm not sure if that was your aim or not, but I feel i should bring it up.
